name: Quick and Easy Hamburger Stroganoff
author: Denny
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of mushroom soup (such as Campbell's®)
1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of chicken soup (such as Campbell's®)
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 5 minutes; drain
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Saute onion in hot butter until translucent, about 5 minutes
Add ground beef to skillet in small chunks; cook and stir to break the beef into smaller pieces as it cooks until no longer pink, 5 to 7 minutes
Sprinkle flour over the beef mixture, stir, and cook for 1 minute
Stir mushrooms and garlic salt into the beef mixture
Pour mushroom soup and chicken soup over beef, stir, and cook until hot, about 5 minutes; add sour cream, stir until smooth, and cook until again hot, 2 to 3 minutes more
Pour beef mixture over the cooked egg noodles
